title: National Australia Bank (nab) fonts
content:
There is a NAB ( [http://nab.com.au/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227021621/http:/nab.com.au/ "http://nab.com.au/") ) near my work and i love seeing the fonts they use.

i've been trying to figure it out for a while and wondered if the sans was Apex, but it appears not to be.

i have no idea what the other main one is.

Sans:http://nab.com.au/wps/wcm/connect/nab/nab/home/personal\_finance/21/320/nab+choice+package+-+because+saving+on+your+home+loan+matters?WT.seg\_1=TAB&WT.seg\_2=TAB-N&WT.ac=TAB-N

Other: [https://www.nab.com.au/wps/wcm/connect/nab/nab/home/personal\_finance/2/2...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227021621/https:/www.nab.com.au/wps/wcm/connect/nab/nab/home/personal_finance/2/20/8?campaignID=SVV&WT.seg_1=SVV&WT.seg_2=SVV-N&WT.ac=SVV-N "https://www.nab.com.au/wps/wcm/connect/nab/nab/home/personal\_finance/2/20/8?campaignID=SVV&WT.seg\_1=SVV&WT.seg\_2=SVV-N&WT.ac=SVV-N")

i really, really, really, like the sans.
author: Sye

comments.content: thank you! i really love it.
